# dokku Provider

Interact with dokku

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "dokku" {
  ssh_host = "127.0.0.1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `ssh_host` (String)

### Optional

- `fail_on_untested_version` (Boolean)
- `ssh_cert` (String)
- `ssh_port` (Number)
- `ssh_user` (String)
